results.title: Pandora's box
results.brief_description: A delightful experiment in social satire. A large box floats into view, then begins to revolve and change shape. Doors open and close to reveal quick snatches in color of zooming airplanes, TV commercials, silent movies, a mouth spouting gobbledygook, and, finally a loop of film which is eaten by the box in one gulp. Is the box our world?
results.description: A delightful experiment in social satire. A large box floats into view, then begins to revolve and change shape. results.title: Pandora
results.creator_credit: Derek May, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Experimental filmmaker Derek May and colour cameraman Martin Duckworth collaberated here in a surrealistic retelling of the old myth. A film of technical experiment with forceful, colourful effect and creative use of shadows.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Derek May, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Pandas: a gift from China
results.creator_credit: Thomas Smith and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Shows the two giant pandas presented to the United States in 1972 by China. Records the playful antics of the pandas in their specially designed enclosures at the National Zoological Park in Washington, DC. Also shows the people and jobs that are important to the efficient operation of zoos.

results.title: Pandas aren't always cuddly
results.brief_description: Did you know that pandas need to eat 45 kilos of bamboo each night in order to survive? Even a hundred years after its discovery, the Giant Panda is still a mystery. This special video explores the natural behaviour of the Giant Panda, filming its unique courtship rituals and the feeding and nurturing of its young. Narrated by David Attenborough, the secret life of the panda may shatter all your illusions.

results.title: Pandamonium
results.creator_credit: Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE) and Daniel Riddle
results.brief_description: A bad tempered stuffed panda is plucked from the window display of a toy store by a sweet little girl. 3-D computer animation. Original score composed by Chris Lam Sam.

results.title: Pancho
results.brief_description: From the book written and illustrated by Berta and Elmer Hader, this animated story tells of a young Mexican boy, Pancho, who unexpectedly becomes a hero when he captures a bull.
